text.div:
ODH Encounter Logical Model

A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

name: EncounterModel
title: ODH Encounter Logical Model
description: A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

element.definition: A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

element.short: The person this entry belongs to.
element.definition: The person this entry belongs to.

element.short: The subject of the observation, if someone other than the person of record (the patient) is the subject, for example, a relative of the person of record.
element.definition: The subject of the observation, if someone other than the person of record (the patient) is the subject, for example, a relative of the person of record.

element.short: The person or entity that provided the information in the entry, e.g. the subject (patient), medical professional, family member, device or software program, as distinct from who recorded the entry.
element.definition: The person or entity that provided the information in the entry, e.g. the subject (patient), medical professional, family member, device or software program, as distinct from who recorded the entry.

element.short: The person who entered the order on behalf of another individual for example in the case of a verbal or a telephone order.
element.definition: The person who entered the order on behalf of another individual for example in the case of a verbal or a telephone order.

element.short: Provenance information specific to the signing of the clinical statement.
element.definition: Provenance information specific to the signing of the clinical statement.

element.short: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.
element.definition: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.

element.short: Specific type of encounter (e.g. e-mail consultation, surgical day-care, skilled nursing, rehabilitation).
element.definition: Specific type of encounter (e.g. e-mail consultation, surgical day-care, skilled nursing, rehabilitation).

element.short: A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year.
element.definition:
A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year.
If the start element is missing, the start of the period is not known. If the end element is missing, it means that the period is ongoing, or the start may be in the past, and the end date in the future, which means that period is expected/planned to end at the specified time. The end value includes any matching date/time. For example, the period 2011-05-23 to 2011-05-27 includes all the times from the start of the 23rd May through to the end of the 27th of May.

element.short: The current standing or state.
element.definition: The current standing or state.

element.short: Choice of types representing the current standing or state.
element.definition: Choice of types representing the current standing or state.

element.short: Choice of types representing the current standing or state.
element.definition: Choice of types representing the current standing or state.

element.short: The larger entity that this is a portion of. For example, an organization might be part of a larger organization, or an encounter with a hospitalist might be part of a larger hospitalization encounter.
element.definition: The larger entity that this is a portion of. For example, an organization might be part of a larger organization, or an encounter with a hospitalist might be part of a larger hospitalization encounter.

element.short: A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.
element.definition: A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

element.short: A diagnosis, which is a disease or injury determined to be present through evaluation of patient history, examination, and/or review of laboratory data.
element.definition: A diagnosis, which is a disease or injury determined to be present through evaluation of patient history, examination, and/or review of laboratory data.

element.short: An entry concerning a patient where the result is a narrative text. Can be related to a specific Focus, such as a condition; and evidence and interpretation from FindingTopic.
element.definition: An entry concerning a patient where the result is a narrative text. Can be related to a specific Focus, such as a condition; and evidence and interpretation from FindingTopic.
